skins.shipDescription: First ship of the Fusou-class battleships, Fusou.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Sakura Empire's first super-dreadnought, Fusou. In order to cleanse ourselves of the misfortune we were born with, my sister and I offer prayers to the gods every day. We will do whatever it takes to prevent another tragedy like Leyte Gulf from befalling us again. Milord, we would be most grateful should you lend us your aid.
skins.acquisition: It is an honor to meet you. Milord, you must be the commander. I, Fusou, have been waiting a long time for you. Surely, this is also the guidance of the gods. From now on, please allow me to serve youI
skins.login: Welcome back, Milord. Would you like to have your fortune told?
skins.details: Milord, shall we have tea together?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I believe that we can change our misfortunes, as long as we work hard and pray...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'll be happy as long as Yamashiro has a chance to grow up.
skins.secretaryIdle3: My main gun specializes in heavy firepower, but is enough to shake my entire body! It can cause me some trouble, every now and then...
skins.secretaryTouch: Milord, please rest your head here and allow me to clean your ears.

skins.shipDescription: Milord! Thank you~ Not just for the retrofit, but for many many things. Hehe, it was the greatest of fortune for me and Yamashiro to meet you.
skins.acquisition: Milord! Thank you~ Not just for the retrofit, but for many many things. Hehe, it was the greatest of fortune for me and Yamashiro to meet you.
skins.login: Milord, welcome back~ The profits show that today good things will happen~
skins.details: I actually got a lot of things that I want to try, such as be as lively as Yamashiro... hmm, is that too much?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Becoming more¡­ lively? Hehe, that must be merrited by Milord.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I feel¡­ that bad luck still exists, but being together with you, Milord, has washed away all my bad luck.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Yamashiro always tells me to look for my own happiness, and I think I¡¯ve finally found it~
skins.secretaryTouch: Milord, do you like the dignified Fusou or the livelier Fusou?

skins.shipDescription: Yamashiro's always saying that I would look better in more trendy clothing, so she went out of her way to pick this out for me. Jeez, that girl... Oh, Commander? Does this outfit... suit me?
skins.acquisition: Yamashiro's always saying that I would look better in more trendy clothing, so she went out of her way to pick this out for me. Jeez, that girl... Oh, Commander? Does this outfit... suit me?
skins.login: Commander, your luck has been very good recently. Surely, it must be because the gods are also happy.
skins.details: Commander, would you like to accompany me for a stroll?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, if it begins to snow, please take cover under my umbrella~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Perhaps I should return the favor and make something for Yamashiro to wear... Commander, what kind of outfit do you think is best?
skins.secretaryIdle3: The happiness we can enjoy right now is surely a blessing from the gods... No, it's because of your hard work, Commander.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, please accept this present. It was prepared specially for you.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander? Even though it's a holiday, this kind of thing is...!

skins.shipDescription: Being able to wait for my beloved in this homely attire... Milord, my life has changed so much since meeting you. *giggles*
skins.acquisition: Being able to wait for my beloved in this homely attire... Milord, my life has changed so much since meeting you. *giggle*
skins.login: Milord, I just made some snacks. Would you like to try some?
skins.details: Milord, I feel my bad luck melting away when I am with you... Thank you very much.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Ah... oh no, look at the time... Milord, time passes so quickly when I'm with you. I forgot that I was supposed to take Yamashiro shopping...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Milord, do you know how to play Hanafuda cards? Ah, was it Souryuu who taught you how to play? Um, in that case... shall we play together?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Milord, the freshly washed blankets sure smell nice. Surely, they'll also be very comfortable to sleep on.
skins.secretaryTouch: You'd like to take me out? Are you sure? Um, in that case... there are a lot of places I'd like to go with you. Ehehe~
